sentence: McConnell also likes what he sees at the outset in Georgia and Nevada, where he is backing Herschel Walker and Adam Laxalt, respectively.

sentence: Hawley previously endorsed Parnell and, like most Senate Republicans, is backing Herschel Walker in Georgias Senate race, where Walker is also facing allegations of past domestic abuse.

sentence: In December, another Trump-backed Senate candidate, the former professional football player Herschel Walker, who is running in Georgia, told Axios he was accountable for past violent behavior toward his former wife, Cindy Grossman.

sentence: Ex-wife accuses Missouri Senate candidate Eric Greitens of domestic abuse March 22, 202201:37 Consider these all of these different problems: In Georgia, GOP frontrunner Herschel Walker (who is much more likely than Greitens is to win the Republican nomination and has largely consolidated the party around him) has admitted his own past violent behavior as part of his struggle with mental illness.
